snippet: A gunman who wounded a guard at a conservative Washington lobbying group’s offices last year pleaded guilty in Federal District Court to terrorism and other charges on Wednesday.
abstract: Floyd Corkins II, gunman who wounded guard at offices of conservative Washington lobbying group Family Research Council in 2012, pleads guilty in Federal District Court to terrorism and other charges.
lead_paragraph: A gunman who wounded a guard at a conservative Washington lobbying group’s offices last year pleaded guilty in Federal District Court to terrorism and other charges on Wednesday.

headline.main: Gunman Pleads Guilty in Shooting at Lobbying Office
headline.print_headline: Gunman Pleads Guilty In Shooting at Lobbying Office

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
